overview.en: Wgls is the ecological mother currency of the world game Federation defi and the 'central bank' of WGL's decentralized financial system.            Wgls flexibly adjusts the currency circulation through rebase mechanism, once at 20:00 every day.                      In order to ensure the scarcity of money, rebase benchmark price is increased by 10% every month. And the introduction of deflation mechanism: each transfer on the chain will have 1% of the money destroyed annihilation, to ensure that prices continue to rise.                      Wgls aims to replace gold, become a new generation of stored value object, and realize the 'sustainable rise' of price.
overview.zh: WGLS是世界游戏联盟DeFi生态母币，是WGL去中心化金融体系的“中央银行”。           WGLS通过Rebase机	制弹性调整货币流通量，在每日20：00进行一次流通量调整。           为保证货币稀缺性，Rebase基准价每月固定上调10%。并引入通缩机制：每次链上转账将有1%的货币销毁湮灭，保障价格持续上涨。           WGLS目标取代黄金，成为新一代的储值标的物，并实现价格的“永续上涨”
